message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
Your share loses value quickly, Alice. Let's make a deal now. 55-45 is my offer.
I can still get a bit more than 50%. My share may lose value, but I'll take that risk.
This is my final offer, Alice. A 50/50 split is the fairest I can do.  Take it or leave it.
